about_the_game:
No need to install into avatar
This sleep animation system for VR is compatible with VRChat's OSC Trackers.

Overview:


RBS OSC SuiminSystem is a virtual sleep tracker application designed for VR experiences. It is compatible with VRChat's OSC trackers.

With this application, you can seamlessly switch between different sleeping poses such as supine, prone, and sideways, without the need to integrate them into the avatar, which was previously a requirement.

Features:


Seamless switching between poses: You can effortlessly switch between supine, prone, and sideways sleeping positions without the need for the cumbersome FootAnchor toggle.

No need to install into the avatar: Additionally, there is no longer a need to open Unity and install a sleep system into your avatar. Menu assets are included for those who wish to control the FootAnchor and other features, but excluding them will not affect the functionality. It's a bonus feature!

Disclaimer: This product has not been individually licensed or endorsed by VRChat.

name: RBS OSC-SuiminSystem

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
